displayName.text: Haryana Tourism- Gauriyya Hotel And Restaurant

places.shortFormattedAddress: National Highway 10, Sector 6, Opp: Devilal Park, Bahadurgarh

text.text: Nestled near Brigadier Hoshiar Singh metro station, Gauriyya impresses with its charming ambiance and above-average party and wedding offerings. The well-equipped banquet hall and delectable food make it a standout choice ensuring a delightful experience for locals and tourists alike.

originalText.text: Nestled near Brigadier Hoshiar Singh metro station, Gauriyya impresses with its charming ambiance and above-average party and wedding offerings. The well-equipped banquet hall and delectable food make it a standout choice ensuring a delightful experience for locals and tourists alike.

text.text:
On the main road of Bahadurgarh, government maintained resort, with good quality, cleaned banquet hall, open garden, small hall for small functions.
Rooms available are also clean with delux rooms and simple rooms.

editorialSummary.text: Streamlined quarters in a laid-back hotel featuring a restaurant, a spa & a pool, plus a gym.

text.text: Good hotel at Bahadurgarh. Rooms were clean, immaculate with all necessary facilities. Running hot water. Breakfast spread was impressive n tasty. Food in lunch n dinner was excellent, better than most good hotels. I had 2 day stay n all 4 meals were excellent with different menu. Highly recommended, value for money

originalText.text: Good hotel at Bahadurgarh. Rooms were clean, immaculate with all necessary facilities. Running hot water. Breakfast spread was impressive n tasty. Food in lunch n dinner was excellent, better than most good hotels. I had 2 day stay n all 4 meals were excellent with different menu. Highly recommended, value for money

text.text: The food was very nice and tasty. The rooms are big, spacious and clean. The service was nice. Only thing the hot water system doesn't work properly.

originalText.text: The food was very nice and tasty. The rooms are big, spacious and clean. The service was nice. Only thing the hot water system doesn't work properly.

text.text:
The overall experience was quite bad. I stayed with my friends for a night and the behaviour of staff members was very rude. They were not ready to adjust or even listen to what we have to say. Room service was also neglected. There was a big electricity breakdown for the whole night and no steps were taken to either resolve it or even give compensation to customers. In morning as well they were not ready to listen to what we have to say and were very rude. The only thing they care about is money and nothing else.

Overall worst experience.

text.text: The Royal Celebration Banquet exceeded all expectations. The opulent decor set a regal tone, complemented by impeccable service. The diverse menu showcased culinary mastery, with each dish a gastronomic delight. The attention to detail, from table settings to entertainment, contributed to an unforgettable experience. A truly royal celebration worth every accolade.

A truly royal celebration worth every accolade.

places.name: places/ChIJK3YDq7YNDTkRPLGamDtmk0o
places.formattedAddress: Omaxe City, Bypass, Sector 14, Bahadurgarh, Haryana 124507, India
places.adrFormatAddress: Omaxe City, Bypass, Sector 14, Bahadurgarh, Haryana 124507, India

text.text:
Basically it’s not a hotel or resort. It’s a convention centre and a party place. They have some rooms for the people to have rest or get ready for the function. Those rooms are rented out.
There is absolutely no reception, no check in check out, no security, no restaurant, no heater, no lobby. You have only a person who stays with a family somewhere around this place.
There was not even a proper lock to our room and every time we had to call someone to open it. Someone was sleeping in the room when we arrived. We insisted to change the bed sheets. Each and every thing we had to insist to get changed. Room was totally dusty and was not cleaned. Bathrooms were dirty. There was no bucket no toiletries and don’t expect it from them. As I told you it’s just a room for people to change and get ready for the function.
Absolutely no Transport facilities. You have to walk around 1.4 kms to find a shop.

Only point is bathroom is almost as big as the room.

Note:- All the reviews I give here is based on my personal experience. I give my reviews honestly and it’s not influenced by any means.
